divs: Sighting DetailsJust after sunset, while in my backyard, I saw a fast moving object that changed colors ( bright red to blue to green) as well as direction very rapidly. It seemed to come out of nowhere, close to the ground (2000 - 3000 feet?). As it got closer it seemed to slow down a little and then change directions suddenly and then disappear . Army helicopters from Ft. Hood were in the area at the time. This object did not appear to be anything like an aircraft or meteor or any other standard object that I have seen before. I heard no noise (other than the helicopters).

Summary: Just after sunset while in my backyard I saw a a fast moving object that changed colors as well as directions rapidly.
